name: Spooky Pacman
description:
A small game based on a recent TerminalMontage video.

WASD / Arrow Keys to move. Shift (or numpad0) to sprint, but that's also louder...

I think the game isn't too hard to figure out.

1, 2, 3 control the sizing of the window. 4 toggles fullscreen.

Backspace forces a game restart, but that shouldn't be necessary.
